jobTitle: Software Engineer - Storage System and Cache
jobDescription: Job Duties:Individual technical contributor within the research team focused on new memory based storage systemsResearch and prototype new memory object model for database, file system, or in-memory computing frameworkDesign and implement performance modeling including workloads characterization and benchmark test casesWork with other team members toward prototyping efforts including defining component level requirements of memory sub-componentsRequirements:BS or a higher degree in relative engineering fields2-5 years related experience or equivalentExperience in storage system design and implementation, Understanding of data server applications and benchmarks – NoSQL, Big Data, Distributed Cache, Programming skills in C/C++, Python is a plus, Development experience in heterogeneous (CPU/GPU) computing architecture is a strong plus SK hynix America
